item.title: DimsTransfor

item.title: ShapeMatch
item.author: liudongdong1
item.description: 1. Image Moments Calculation 1.1. raw moments 1.2. central moments the central moments are translation invariant, no matter where the blob is in the image, if the shape is the same, the moment will be the same. 1.3. Normalized central moments both translation and scale invariant. 2. Hu Moments Hu Moments are a set of 7 numbers calculated using central moments that are invariant to image transformations, the first 6
